messages.author: Dominique Woodberry
messages.subject: Looking for a new car
messages.content:
Hi everyone, 

 My brother is looking for a new car. If you see one that you think would suit him could you drop me an email please. Be sure to say: 

 Where you saw the car. 
 What make and model it is. 
 Why you think it would suit my brother. 

 Thanks in advance, 
	 Dominique

messages.author: Customer Services
messages.subject: Re: your complaint
messages.content:
Dear Sir/Madam 

 We are very sorry to hear that you have been having trouble with one of our products. In order to resolve this, please could you reply with detail of: 

	The product in question.
	When you purchased it.
	The problems you have had with it.

Yours faithfully,
	Customer Services

messages.author: DVLA
messages.subject: The DVLA wants your views!
messages.content:
The Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) are considering making changes to the UK driving license system in order to reduce the number of deaths on the roads.Planned changes include:

Raising the minimum driving age from 17 to 19

Learners mush have at least 60 hours of supervised practice before taking a test

Learner drivers must practice for at least one year before taking a test

Motorway driving skills and skid training are included in the driving test

Newly qualified drivers will not be allowed to:
	drive between 9pm and 5pm for one year
	go faster then 45mph for one year
	carry passengers in the back seat for one year

Please reply to this email with your views.

Faithfully,
	Mrs A Carr

messages.author: Berenice Pilfold
messages.subject: Christmas Concert
messages.content:
We are looking for acts for the Village Hall Christmas concert. Do You have a hidden talent?

Are you a carol singer?

Are you a comedian?

Do you play a musical instrument?

 Please reply to this email with your application. Please explain what you will do in the concert and why your act is suitable.

messages.author: Recruiter
messages.subject: Job Vacancies
messages.content:
Our Job search found the following matches for you:

Cats-R-Us:
	Cattery requires young person to help look after cats. Room for 200 cats at any one time. Applicant must like animals and be able to work unsocial hours.

Windows-4-U:
	A Manager is required by a local company that manufactures windows. The applicant must be in good health and like working in all weathers and at high levels.

As we already have your CV on file, please reply with a cover letter detailing:

	The job you would like to apply for
	Why you think you would be suitable for the position
	Any previous experience you think may be relevant

Regards,
	You friends at Recruiter.com
